title: Biden announces aircraft carriers to be named after Bush and Clinton
shortDescription: President Joe Biden announced that the nation’s next two aircraft carriers will be named after former presidents George W. Bush and Bill Clinton.

title: Lawmakers urge Biden to extend deadline for TikTok ban
shortDescription: Some U.S. lawmakers are advocating for an extension on the deadline for TikTok's Beijing parent company to sell U.S. assets before a ban takes effect.

title: Jack Smith's bombshell report on Trump
shortDescription: Special counsel Jack Smith's report on the election case against President-elect Donald Trump was released publicly.

title: Senators question Pete Hegseth, Trump's nominee to lead the Pentagon
shortDescription: Pete Hegseth, a former Fox News host and veteran picked by Donald Trump to run the Pentagon, faces senators' questions at his confirmation hearing.

title: Daily Briefing: Why Jack Smith didn't convict Trump
shortDescription: Special counsel says Trump's election prohibited case from going to trial. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: Jeffries? Newsom? AOC? Democrats want a new generation - Poll
shortDescription: In a new USA TODAY/Suffolk Poll, Democrats by 4-1 cite rising leaders over the Old Guard to lead the party.

title: Poll: For Trump, a stronger hand but skepticism on tax cuts, tariffs
shortDescription: In a new USA TODAY/Suffolk poll, 31% of Americans feel "excited" about Trump taking office, 31% feel "afraid."

title: Trump's border czar wants immigrant-finding hotline. It already exists
shortDescription: Immigration and Customs Enforcement has had a tip line for more than 20 years. Some advocates support the proposal anyway, but others are skeptical.

title: Melania Trump: ‘I will be in the White House’ on Day One
shortDescription: The once and future first lady plans her return to the White House amid questions of how much time she'll actually spend there.

title: Read the report: Jack Smith defends Trump election case
shortDescription: Jack Smith argued his office had the evidence to secure a conviction against Donald Trump if the election case had ever gone to trial.

title: Special counsel says evidence enough to convict Trump in election case
shortDescription: Smith's report provides new details about election-interference charges against Trump, says he believes election victory saved him from conviction.

title: Top Republicans say 'conditions' could be placed on California aid
shortDescription: A number of Republicans are calling for conditions to any federal aid that goes to California as the state struggles with catastrophic wildfires.

title: Special counsel for Hunter Biden slams 'wrong' Joe Biden comments
shortDescription: The report of the special counsel behind the prosecutions against Hunter Biden, David Weiss, was released Monday.

title: FBI unlocked Trump rally shooter's phone within days | Fact check
shortDescription: Investigators accessed the Trump rally gunman's phone within days of the shooting, according to the FBI.

title: Steve Bannon vows to stop 'evil guy' Elon Musk's influence over Trump
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's former chief strategist Steve Bannon said Elon Musk is a "truly evil guy" and vowed to "take this guy down."

title: Biden pokes Putin, defends global record
shortDescription: President Joe Biden argued in a farewell foreign policy address that he made the country stronger and more secure ahead of Donald Trump's return.

title: Supreme Court considers whether disability rights law protects retirees
shortDescription: The ADA protects from discrimination someone who can perform a job with a reasonable accommodation. Does it also protect retirees?

title: Trump Defense pick faces 'big issues of character'
shortDescription: Sen. Roger Wicker, R-Miss., chair of the Armed Services Committee, has signaled Hegseth is likely to be confirmed as defense secretary.

title: New Biden rule keeps top AI chips from China, Russia
shortDescription: Secretary of Commerce Gina Raimondo said the new policy will help build a trusted technology ecosystem around the world.
